MangosOrange Services Pvt. Ltd.

MangosOrange is an IT consulting, staffing, payroll outsourcing, manpower, and software development company founded in 2017 and headquartered in Delhi NCR (Noida). We help enterprises and SMEs with business automation, cloud transformation, and workforce solutions across India.

Core Services

  • IT Consulting & Software Development
  • Staffing Solutions & Manpower Outsourcing
  • Payroll Outsourcing & Contract Labour
  • Cloud Strategy, Migration & Security
  • Facility Management & Skill Development
